name: Super Dash (EmilTheApril)
description:
SuperDash is a speedrunner game with a global leaderboard! Pick you name a get to the top of the leaderboard! More and more levels will come out! The same goes for sound.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Move: A W S D / Arrows / Space

Dash: Left Shift + A/D/Left/right arrow

Restart run: R
